A4.text: Spanish is spoken by about 99% of Spaniards as a first or second language.

A5.text: According to a 2019 Pew Research survey, the most commonly spoken languages at home other than Spanish were Catalan in 8% of households.

A8.text: The Astur-leonese variant known as leonese is spoken in the Castile and Leon region.

A9.text: Spanish is the official language of Spain.

A10.text: The Spanish Constitution of 1978 uses the term castellano to define the official language of the whole of Spain.
